menu.blockgame.title.watermark: Blockgame Enhanced mod by Jake (aka notIrma)
menu.blockgame.quit.title: Are you sure you want to quit?
menu.blockgame.quit.description: Any unsaved changes will NOT be lost. Haha. It's Minecraft.
menu.blockgame.warp.subheader: Where do you want to go?
hud.blockgame.toast.party.joined.title: Player joined party
hud.blockgame.toast.party.left.title: Player left party
hud.blockgame.toast.party.disbanded.desc: Every player has left, the party has been disbanded.
hud.blockgame.message.welcome.1: §9Welcome! Thank you for using my mod. §c❤
hud.blockgame.message.welcome.2: §e⚠ If you run into any issues, please submit an issue on the GitHub repository.
text.autoconfig.blockgameenhanced.title: Blockgame Options
text.autoconfig.blockgameenhanced.option: If disabled, the list of party members will no longer appear on-screen.
Will show your player in the party member list when enabled.
What corner of the screen the party hud will display at.
Will play the game-over sound when one of your party members dies.

If turned on, will automatically respawn you shortly after dying.
NOTE: Disabling this option will currently disable the custom game-over sequence.
This is not intended and will be resolved in a future release.

Draws a blue outline around party members when enabled
so that you can easily distinguish them from other players
in the world.
Overrides the Minecraft title screen with a custom Blockgame one when enabled.

Displays item names and their amount above items on the floor when enabled.
NOTE: Relog for changes to fully take effect.
Checks for mod updates on startup when enabled.
Announce to all your friends that you play game. It's the way.
Whether or not to display if you are logged in on your Discord Rich Presence.
Whether or not to display stats about an ongoing party on your Discord Rich Presence.
menu.blockgame.update.message.2: Update to receive awesome new features and improvements.
